column1: Cormano (Milanese: Cormàn [kurˈmãː]) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Italian region Lombardy
column2: located about 9 kilometres (6 mi) north of Milan.

column1: Cormano borders the following municipalities: Paderno Dugnano
column6: Milan. It is served by Cormano-Brusuglio railway station.
